official-title.#text: To prohibit an increase in the number of flag and general officers.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: No funds appropriated for fiscal year 2014 may be used for flag or general officers for each military department that are in excess to the number of such officers serving in such military department as of the date of enactment of this Act.

header.#text: No increase in flag or general officers

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3866 IH: To prohibit an increase in the number of flag and general officers.
